Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class DevDeck

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.observer.Observable
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.DevDeck
public class DevDeck
extends Observable
Class DevDeck represents a deck of development cards.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.util.List<DevCard> cards  
    private Colour colour  
    private int level  

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    DevDeck​(int level, Colour colour)
    Creates a DevDeck object of the specified level and colour.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    DevCard drawCard()
    Draws the first card from the deck and notifies all the players' virtual views with a NewDevDeck message containing the new first card of the deck.

  • Field Details

    • cards

      private final java.util.List<DevCard> cards

    • colour

      private final Colour colour

    • level

      private final int level

  • Constructor Details

    • DevDeck

      public DevDeck​(int level, Colour colour)
      Creates a DevDeck object of the specified level and colour. It retrieves all the necessary information from the json files. After the cards have been created, the deck is shuffled.
      Parameters:
      level - the level of the cards in the deck
      colour - the colour of the cards in the deck

  • Method Details

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Checks id the deck is empty.
      Returns:
      true if the deck is empty, false otherwise

    • getFirstCard

      public DevCard getFirstCard()

    • notifyNew

      public void notifyNew()
      Notifies all the players' virtual views with a NewDevDeck message. Used in the setup phase.

    • notifyNew

      public void notifyNew​(java.lang.String nickname)
      Notifies the player's virtual view with a NewDevDeck message. Used when a player is reconnecting to the game.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player's nickname

    • getCards

      public java.util.List<DevCard> getCards()
      Returns the cards in the deck. Used in unit tests only.
      Returns:
      the list of cards in the deck

    • getColour

      public Colour getColour()
      Returns the colour of the deck.
      Returns:
      the colour of the deck

    • getLevel

      public int getLevel()
      Returns the level of the deck.
      Returns:
      the level of the deck

    • drawCard

      public DevCard drawCard()
      Draws the first card from the deck and notifies all the players' virtual views with a NewDevDeck message containing the new first card of the deck.
      Returns:
      the drawn development card if the deck is not empty, null otherwise

    • peepRequirements

      public java.util.List<ResourceQuantity> peepRequirements()
      Returns a copy of the requirements list of the first card of the deck. Used in the checkAction method in BuyDevCard class.
      Returns:
      a copy of the requirements list of the first card or an empty list if the deck is empty
